sentence: What kind of chili do they serve at the cannibal prison?? chili con carne!
explanation: In the context of the joke, con refers to a criminal
first_new_sentence: The man was convicted of a crime and is now serving time in prison as a con.
second_new_sentence: The group decided to con their way into getting free tickets for the concert.

sentence: How do you communicate with a fish? you drop it a line!
explanation: In the context of the joke, line refers to a fishing line
first_new_sentence: The fisherman carefully cast his line into the water, hoping for a good catch.
second_new_sentence: The manager drew a line on the chart to indicate the sales target for the month.
